title: Maud Martha - distinguishes Maud Martha's attitude

content.question: Which of the following most clearly distinguishes Maud Marthaâ€™s attitude from that of Mama and Helen?

choices.label: Maud Martha is reluctant to accept the impending misfortune, whereas Mama and Helen try to accommodate it.
Maud Martha wants to shield Papa, whereas Mama and Helen want to urge him to fight.
Maud Martha is eager to move to South Park, but Mama and Helen are reluctant to move.
Maud Martha is enraged at Mama, Helen, and Papa for quietly accepting misfortune.

content.answer: Maud Martha is reluctant to accept the impending misfortune, whereas Mama and Helen try to accommodate it.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
